keyentry.name: FIRE_WEAPON
keyentry.title: Fire
keyentry.description: Fire current weapon

keyentry.name: TURN_LEFT
keyentry.title: Rotate left
keyentry.description: Turn the tank to the left

keyentry.name: TURN_LEFT_SLOW
keyentry.title: Rotate left (slowly)
keyentry.description: Turn the tank to the left slowly

keyentry.name: TURN_LEFT_VSLOW
keyentry.title: Rotate left (very slowly)
keyentry.description: Turn the tank to the left slowly

keyentry.name: TURN_LEFT_FAST
keyentry.title: Rotate left (fast)
keyentry.description: Turn the tank to the left quickly

keyentry.name: TURN_RIGHT
keyentry.title: Rotate right
keyentry.description: Turn the tank to the right

keyentry.name: TURN_RIGHT_SLOW
keyentry.title: Rotate right (slowly)
keyentry.description: Turn the tank to the right slowly

keyentry.name: TURN_RIGHT_VSLOW
keyentry.title: Rotate right (very slowly)
keyentry.description: Turn the tank to the right slowly

keyentry.name: TURN_RIGHT_FAST
keyentry.title: Rotate right (fast)
keyentry.description: Turn the tank to the right quicky

keyentry.name: ROTATE_UP
keyentry.title: Increase elevation
keyentry.description: Increase the tank's angle of elevation

keyentry.name: ROTATE_UP_SLOW
keyentry.title: Increase elevation (slowly)
keyentry.description: Increase the tank's angle of elevation slowly

keyentry.name: ROTATE_UP_VSLOW
keyentry.title: Increase elevation (very slowly)
keyentry.description: Increase the tank's angle of elevation slowly

keyentry.name: ROTATE_UP_FAST
keyentry.title: Increase elevation (fast)
keyentry.description: Increase the tank's angle of elevation quickly

keyentry.name: ROTATE_DOWN
keyentry.title: Decrease elevation
keyentry.description: Decrease the tank's angle of elevation

keyentry.name: ROTATE_DOWN_SLOW
keyentry.title: Decrease elevation (slowly)
keyentry.description: Decrease the tank's angle of elevation slowly

keyentry.name: ROTATE_DOWN_VSLOW
keyentry.title: Decrease elevation (very slowly)
keyentry.description: Decrease the tank's angle of elevation slowly

keyentry.name: ROTATE_DOWN_FAST
keyentry.title: Decrease elevation (fast)
keyentry.description: Decrease the tank's angle of elevation quickly

keyentry.name: INCREASE_POWER
keyentry.title: Increase power
keyentry.description: Increase the tank's shot power

keyentry.name: INCREASE_POWER_SLOW
keyentry.title: Increase power (slowly)
keyentry.description: Increase the tank's shot power slowly

keyentry.name: INCREASE_POWER_VSLOW
keyentry.title: Increase power (very slowly)
keyentry.description: Increase the tank's shot power slowly

keyentry.name: INCREASE_POWER_FAST
keyentry.title: Increase power (fast)
keyentry.description: Increase the tank's shot power quickly

keyentry.name: DECREASE_POWER
keyentry.title: Decrease power
keyentry.description: Decrease the tank's shot power

keyentry.name: DECREASE_POWER_SLOW
keyentry.title: Decrease power (slow)
keyentry.description: Decrease the tank's shot power slowly

keyentry.name: DECREASE_POWER_VSLOW
keyentry.title: Decrease power (very slow)
keyentry.description: Decrease the tank's shot power slowly

keyentry.name: DECREASE_POWER_FAST
keyentry.title: Decrease power (fast)
keyentry.description: Decrease the tank's shot power quickly

keyentry.name: CHANGE_UP_WEAPON
keyentry.title: Next weapon
keyentry.description: Changes to the next available weapon

keyentry.name: CHANGE_DOWN_WEAPON
keyentry.title: Previous weapon
keyentry.description: Changes to the previous available weapon

keyentry.name: AUTO_AIM
keyentry.title: Aim at point
keyentry.description: Aims current tank towards point on landscape

keyentry.name: HIDE_WATER
keyentry.title: Temporarily hide the water
keyentry.description: Temporarily makes the water transparent so you can see through it

keyentry.name: UNDO_MOVE
keyentry.title: Revert to last angles
keyentry.description: Changes the tanks elevation, power and rotation back to those used to make the last shot.

keyentry.name: SHOW_ARENA
keyentry.title: Show arena bounds
keyentry.description: Darkens the arena outside the arena bounds to make the arena area more visible.

keyentry.name: SHOW_QUIT_DIALOG
keyentry.title: Quit
keyentry.description: Shows or hides the quit dialog

keyentry.name: SHOW_GENERAL_CHANNEL_DIALOG
keyentry.title: Online talk
keyentry.description: Shows or hides the general talk dialog

keyentry.name: SHOW_CHANNEL_DIALOG
keyentry.title: Online talk
keyentry.description: Shows or hides the talk dialog

keyentry.name: SHOW_TEAM_CHANNEL_DIALOG
keyentry.title: Online team talk
keyentry.description: Shows or hides the team talk dialog

keyentry.name: SHOW_SCORE_DIALOG
keyentry.title: Show score
keyentry.description: Shows or hides the score dialog

keyentry.name: SHOW_TEAM_DIALOG
keyentry.title: Show tank/name
keyentry.description: Shows or hides the team dialog

keyentry.name: SHOW_CAMERA_DIALOG
keyentry.title: Show mini-camera
keyentry.description: Shows or hides the camera dialog

keyentry.name: SHOW_PROFILE_DIALOG
keyentry.title: Show 2D profile dialog
keyentry.description: Shows or hides the profile dialog

keyentry.name: HUD_ITEMS
keyentry.title: Change HUD
keyentry.description: Toggles the various HUD items on and off

keyentry.name: TIP_ITEMS
keyentry.title: Change Tooltips
keyentry.description: Toggles the various tooltip items on and off

keyentry.name: CONSOLE
keyentry.title: Show console
keyentry.description: Shows or hides the game console

keyentry.title: Hide all dialogs

keyentry.name: SIMULATION_SPEED_X1
keyentry.title: Normal speed
keyentry.description: Changes the simulator to simulate in normal time

keyentry.name: SIMULATION_SPEED_X2
keyentry.title: X2 speed
keyentry.description: Changes the simulator to simulate twice as fast

keyentry.name: SIMULATION_SPEED_X3
keyentry.title: X4 speed
keyentry.description: Changes the simulator to simulate four times as fast

keyentry.name: SIMULATION_SPEED_X4
keyentry.title: X8 speed
keyentry.description: Changes the simulator to simulate eight times as fast

keyentry.name: SIMULATION_SPEED_HALF
keyentry.title: Half speed
keyentry.description: Changes the simulator to simulate half as fast

keyentry.name: SIMULATION_SPEED_QUARTER
keyentry.title: Quarter speed
keyentry.description: Changes the simulator to simulate a quarter times as fast

keyentry.name: SIMULATION_SPEED_EIGHTH
keyentry.title: Eighth speed
keyentry.description: Changes the simulator to simulate a eighth times as fast

keyentry.name: SAVE_SCREEN
keyentry.title: Save screenshot
keyentry.description: Saves the screen as a bitamp file

keyentry.name: ENABLE_PARACHUTES
keyentry.title: Enable parachutes
keyentry.description: Enables parachutes

keyentry.name: ENABLE_SHIELDS
keyentry.title: Enable shields
keyentry.description: Enables shields

keyentry.name: USE_BATTERY
keyentry.title: Use battery
keyentry.description: Uses one battery

keyentry.name: LOG_SCROLL_UP
keyentry.title: Scroll chat log up
keyentry.description: Scroll the chat log back one line

keyentry.name: LOG_SCROLL_DOWN
keyentry.title: Scroll chat log down
keyentry.description: Scroll the chat log forward one line

keyentry.name: LOG_SCROLL_RESET
keyentry.title: Reset chat log position
keyentry.description: Reset the chat log scroll position

keyentry.title: Turn landscape grid on
keyentry.description: Turns the landscape grid on

keyentry.title: Turn landscape contours on
keyentry.description: Turns the landscape height bands on
